text.text: I am really happy to write this review. I have been travelling across the india mostly i booked hotel in southern state of india. Recently my brother marriage was there nearby in a village, so I visited the property after i made a booking based on reviews. And surprisingly once i visited at location my mouth was opened , not because i never seen such hotel , but the facility and specially the cleanliness which will be lacking area in north India part . I have booked hotel for my friend stay and they were very happy that such kind of property is there in a tire-3 town . And specially thank to all the staff who were there. They are really friendly and helpful and professional as well . Well behaved and well trained. I would request please do stay here u will like it.

They are really friendly and helpful and professional as well . Well behaved and well trained. I would request please do stay here u will like it.

text.text: It was a great experience, I accommodated three days here, All services were excellent. Staffs were also helping nature and graceful. The food was also so tasty and joyful.

text.text: The rooms are top notch for a 3 star hotel. The banquet hall is spacious and looks beautiful when decorated. At present, the best place in Lakhisarai for functions.

text.text: Amazing food quality at sangam banquet hall. The food and room service is exceptional. One cannot imagine this level of elegance in a small city like Lakhisarai.  The food was delicious with unique aroma . Staff deployed for room services were respectful and skilled in customer services.
